events.title: Your Online Profile and You
events.description: A discussion on the elements that make up an online profile. Also, a list of the do's and don'ts in regards to your online profile. Before moving onto the later half of our presentation, we will do a quick activity. Following this, we will go over some tips and tricks for creating an online profile, in this case a LinkedIn profile.

events.title: Discussion about Bungie and Gaming
events.guest: Presented by IEEE, Featuring Drew Simmons

events.title: Fruitful Voids and Gardens of Forking Paths: Interactive Narratives in Games
events.description: Let's discuss similarities and differences between traditional storytelling and game narratives, including the importance of branching storylines and player agency.
